para.text: (Key [, DefaultValue]) returns the value of the first vertex of an object in the current element or cell that has a value associated with Key as defined in the
. If no such vertex values are defined, the function returns the default value if a default value has been defined. If no default value is defined, the function returns zero.

Example: If the formula were FirstVertexValue("A_Key") and there were four vertices of the object in the current cell and the values associated with "A_Key" in those vertices were 1, 3, 5, and 2, the value returned would be 1 because it is the first value.
